scenario_text.value: Hey Renamon, do you have a minute?
You want to talk with me? What’s this about?
Oh, nothing special, really...
(What should I say to Renamon?)
Let’s save Miyuki.
Are you nervous?
I wanted to talk.
Let’s save Miyuki.

I just wanted to say, let’s make sure we save
Miyuki no matter what!

Yes, that’s what we’re doing now. Why would
you need to say that to me again?

Oh, y’know, I thought it would help...get you
fired up again.

*sigh* Well, I don’t know about you, but my
own conviction has never wavered.

I am going to bring Miyuki back. That’s all
there is to it.
Are you nervous?

I was just wondering... Are you maybe feeling
nervous?
...What?!

Yeah, no way, right? I figured you wouldn’t
be, but thought I might as well ask...

Of course I’m not nervous! Why would you even
think that?
I wanted to talk.
I just...wanted to talk with you, Renamon.
Why? What’s gotten into you all of a sudden?

Well, we’re coming up on the final battle.
This could be our last chance to chat.
Oh, so that’s it.
Are you feeling nervous, Takuma?
Urk...

I thought so. You know, if you keep on like
this, you could bring the others down.
Yeah, I mean, I know that, but...

Listen, I don’t blame you for being nervous.
Everything depends on this next fight.

But if you can’t find some way to keep cool
despite that, you’ll never beat the Master.

Just think about what you need to do. Don’t
worry about the enemy, or what comes next.

Focus on stopping the Master and rescuing
Miyuki.
Renamon...

Hmph... Listen to me, blathering on like
a fool.

Thanks, Renamon. That really helped me feel
better.

We just need to stop the Master and rescue
Miyuki. That’s it!
Right. I’ll be counting on you.
What? Did you have something else to say?
